page.title: 05My Home
page.content: {A.}My home is a 19 year old L-shaped bungalow with 8 rooms - 3 bedrooms, bathroom,toilet,sitting room,kitchen, hall.I have one bedroom;my two brothers share one;Mum and Dad have the other.Our garden has a shed,slide, sand pit and a den where my brother and I play.I have a garden where I plant flowers;my Dad has a greenhouse. We have a run for the chickens,guinea pig and pheasant. {B.}The White House. My house,once a farm, probably Victorian,has 13 rooms. We now park our cars in what used to be the stables.Lots of bits of china are in the soil where there was once a rubbish dump.There was a second staircase,knocked down when a maid fell down it killing herself.We have a big garden and small paddock.Dad looks after the vegetables,Mum the heathers and flowers.
